title: Yesterday I learned....
body:
Anivia with thunderlord's decree can proc 150 damage before level 11 and before her first core item is completed, so every thirty seconds she can combo you for R (1 tick is enough to apply slow) into her e x2 damage cause slow (point click lul) and aa to proc thunderlord's. Beg for mercy if she lands her Q, just that partial skill combo will easily do over half your health... if you're lucky.

I know  people on GD have been saying Anivia is broken... i thought she might just be "strong" but ffs, there is no way a tear/catalyst blasting rod Anivia should do 80% of your hp (or more!) in a single combo. Throw in a  good use of her wall or Q and you're super dead.


_**!!!!!GUT THE FREELO ICEBIRD!!!!!**_
